mil2:1.7: pāpuṇāmi → na pāpuṇāmi (maku) | majjhanhikasūriyo → majjhantikasuriyo (bj, pts-vp-pli1); majjhattikasuriyo (maku)
mil2:4.4: catubbedā → dhanubbedā (maku); cātubbedā (pts-vp-pli1) | ketu → hetu (bj, maku, pts-vp-pli1) | chandasā buddhavacanena → chando sāmuddi vacanena (bj); chandasā muddā vacanena (pts-vp-pli1) | vitaṇḍavādī → vādī (bj, maku, pts-vp-pli1)
mil2:5.1: senaṅgadassanaṃ katvā → senāgaṇanaṃ kāretvā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); senāgāhaṃ kāretvā (maku) | lokāyatavitaṇḍajanasallāpaplavacittakotūhalo → … ppavattanakotuhalo (bj); … sallāpappavuttako kotuhalo (maku); … pappavattakotūhalo (pts-vp-pli1)
mil2:31.8: Pāpakāni malāni pabbājeti → pāpakānaṃ malānaṃ pabbājetuṃ pabbajito (bj, pts-vp-pli1); pāpaṃ vajjituṃ dosaṃ vajjituṃ (maku)
mil2:33.2: vatthāni, kāmanissitāni gihibyañjanabhaṇḍāni → kamanīyāni gihivyañjanāni (bj, pts-vp-pli1); kammaniyāni gihibyañjanāni (maku)
mil2:74.2: kotthuko → kotthako (maku); koṭṭhuko (csp1ed) | ahituṇḍikasamāgato → ahiguṇṭhikasamāgato (bj, pts-vp-pli1) | satiṃ → dhitiṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); cittaṃ (maku)
